attributes.action: Demand Sussex CCG reconsider the awarding of the PTS contract to Coperforma
attributes.background:
Sussex CCGs have decided against all advice to award the PTS contract to a managed service provider-Coperforma.
The cost of the contract has been massively undervalued by the CCGs, the only way it can realistically be maintained is by cutting eligibility of patients who use the service

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The awarding of such contracts is the responsibility of the clinical commissioning group. 

You could raise your issue directly with the clinical commissioning group using the following website: http://www.coastalwestsussexccg.nhs.uk/contact-us
